entries.meaning: (astronautics) A vehicle that flies through space.
(computing, mathematics, cellular automata) A finite pattern that reappears after a certain number of generations in the same orientation but in a different position.
(programming) The operator <=> in certain programming languages, which compares two values and indicates whether the first is lesser than, greater than, or equal to the second.
examples: If we reverse the positions of $a and $b, the spaceship will sort in the opposite order […]
